alert.note: Alert for Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 08 at 5:37PM CDT until July 08 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Illinois and west central Illinois, including the following counties, in central Illinois, Mason and Tazewell. In west central Illinois, Fulton. * WHEN...Until 845 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Canton, Havana, Lewistown, St. David, Easton, Kilbourne, Dunfermline, Forest City, Bryant, Liverpool, Topeka, Chatauqua Park, Goofy Ridge, Little America, Poplar City and Duncan Mills. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
